item.title: Yell channel (coloured title)
item.dc:creator: @x_sam_x1 x sam x
item.description:
@x_sam_x1 wrote:

I want it so when a donator yells it will have [donator] but the donator in red, i tried doing it but it just came up as [@red@Donator] here is my code:
if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 5 && donator >= 1) {
String titles = “”;

            if (donator == 1) {
                titles = "[@red@Donator] ";
            }
            talk(titles + "" + playerName + ": "
                    + command.substring(5));
    }

Read full topic
